heroDesc: MMORPG bot designed by a player. Automates heals, mana, buffs and pet for your support classes. Perfect for managing Priest, Cleric, Ringmaster, Bard in multi-window.

featuresSubtitle: Here's what Reborn can do for you.
feature1Desc: HP, Mana, Buffs and Pet managed automatically. You play, Reborn handles the rest.
feature2Desc: Everything stays on your PC. Zero tracking, zero collection, zero reselling.
feature3Desc: Configure your combos. CTRL+A to start, CTRL+O to stop.
feature4Desc: Reborn, Neon, Obsidian, Cyber, Matrix, Sakura. Change whenever you want.

pricingSubtitle: Free to test. Premium to unlock everything.
faq1Q: Does the free trial require a credit card?
faq1A: Yes, a card is required for the trial, but you won't be charged during the first 7 days. You can cancel anytime before the trial ends.
faq2A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade anytime from your customer portal. No change fees.
faq3Q: Does the Lifetime plan really include all future updates?
faq3A: Absolutely. The Lifetime plan guarantees access to all updates and new features forever, without ever paying anything more.
faq4A: All your data stays stored locally on your device. We don't collect any personal data and use no tracking or telemetry.
faq5A: Contact us directly by email at seymoon.cell@gmail.com. Premium subscribers get priority response.
